title: Researching Companies on the Bloomberg Terminal
description: This text introduces functions and natural language searches on the Bloomberg Terminal for researching company and individual information, including ANR, CACS, CMAP, DDIS, DES, ERN, ESG, FA, HDS, MGMT, MODL, RV, SPLC, GIP, GP, BBLS, DS, ECO, EQS, MA, PAY, PE, SRCH, NSE, BI, GLCO, LEAG, and PEOP.
